Zac Blanco


I'm currently a commiter on the Apache Knox Project. I believe security is a critical part of the Hadoop ecosystem and Knox helps to provide that functionality. You can see the my projects page for my other projects on GitHub.

I am Currently a student studying Computer Science and Computer Engineering at Rutgers University, The State University of New Jersey, New Brunswick. Expected Graduation: 2018.

I've worked for numerous companies filling technology roles. I've previously worked as a developer at Drivers History Inc. More recently, I've been filling engineering and technical marketing positions at Hortonworks Inc.

While I find data science and analytics as my main field of interest I do have experience with a host of other technologies. You can see my About page found at the top of this website for more information including my LinkedIn profile. Also, take a look at my blog page!
